title.rendered: Samsung EP-TA50UWE 1.5 A UK Mains Charging Adapter

content.rendered:
Product Description

The EP-TA50UWE charger is an official Samsung product constructed from the best high quality supplies and to the strictest requirements. This is right as a spare or alternative on your present charger. With the Samsung 1.5 Amp Wall Charger, you may make certain that your Samsung Galaxy or different micro USB appropriate smartphone will at all times be absolutely charged and able to go. The Samsung 1.5 Amp charger recharges your telephone’s battery at a a lot sooner fee than your typical 1 Amp or 700mAh charger. This is similar mains charger as provided together with your cell phone.

Box Contains

Charger

Make certain this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Energy saving mini charger
Compact & light-weight
High charging effectivity
Voltage: – Input – 100-240VAC˜0.3A 50-60Hz- Output – 5.0VDC=1.55A
